alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Morgan; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:47AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, Oconee, southeastern Barrow, northwestern Morgan, Clarke, Walton and north central Newton Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 847 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Bold Springs to Panthersville, and moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Watkinsville, Athens, Loganville, Social Circle, Walnut Grove, Winterville, Bogart, North High Shoals, Bostwick, Between, Good Hope, Bishop, Hull, Jersey, Whitehall, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, Beechwood Hills and Oconee Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
